# Library of the Dancer of Skins (Level 19 Universalist)
## Overview
*This quartet of books is held together by a shining silver strand wound around the four tomes and tied in an intricate knot. Inside, the writing is expansive and sloppy, filled with marginalia; the author’s notes indicate clear excitement about her discoveries, and while the thinker is obviously brilliant, she is also apparently undisciplined.*

**Value** 16,420 gp (20,695 gp with the preparation ritual)

**Spells**

9th—*choose fate*, *[[Shapechange (Spell)|shapechange]]*, *[[Wish (Spell)|wish]]*, *[[World Wave (Spell)|world wave]]*

8th—*[[Giant Form II (Spell)|giant form II]]*, *[[Polar Ray (Spell)|polar ray]]*, *[[Scintillating Pattern (Spell)|scintillating pattern]]*, *[[Seamantle (Spell)|seamantle]]*, *[[Trap the Soul (Spell)|trap the soul]]*

7th—*[[Control Weather (Spell)|control weather]]*, *[[Elemental Body IV (Spell)|elemental body IV]]*, *[[Phantasmal Revenge (Spell)|phantasmal revenge]]*, *[[Power Word Blind (Spell)|power word blind]]*, *[[Rampart (Spell)|rampart]]*, *[[Spell Turning|spell turning]]*

6th—*[[Beast Shape IV (Spell)|beast shape IV]]*, *[[Cloak of Dreams (Spell)|cloak of dreams]]*, *[[Control Water (Spell)|control water]]*, *[[Fluid Form (Spell)|fluid form]]*, *[[Getaway (Spell)|getaway]]*, *lightning field*, *[[Plant Shape II (Spell)|plant shape II]]*

5th—*comet*, *[[Fabricate (Spell)|fabricate]]*, *[[Fire Snake (Spell)|fire snake]]*, *[[Geyser (Spell)|geyser]]*, *[[Hold Monster (Spell)|hold monster]]*, *[[Overland Flight (Spell)|overland flight]]*, *[[Planar Adaptation (Spell)|planar adaptation]]*, *[[Telekinesis|telekinesis]]*

4th—*[[Dragon's Breath (Spell)|dragon’s breath]]*, *[[Dimension Door (Spell)|dimension door]]*, *[[Firefall (Spell)|firefall]]*, *[[Invisibility, Greater (Spell)|greater invisibility]]*, *[[Moonstruck (Spell)|moonstruck]]*, *rainbow helix*, *[[True Form (Spell)|true form]]*, *[[Wandering Star Motes (Spell)|wandering star motes]]*

3rd—*[[Blink (Spell)|blink]]*, *[[Cloak of Winds (Spell)|cloak of winds]]*, *[[Elemental Aura (Spell)|elemental aura]]*, *[[Fly (Spell)|fly]]*, *lightwall*, *shifting sands*, *[[Twilight Knife (Spell)|twilight knife]]*, *[[Versatile Weapon (Spell)|versatile weapon]]*

2nd—*[[Arrow Eruption (Spell)|arrow eruption]]*, *[[Dust of Twilight (Spell)|dust of twilight]]*, *[[Elemental Speech (Spell)|elemental speech]]*, *fantastic reach*, *[[Fire Breath, Greater (Spell)|Fire Breath, Greater]]*, *metabolize*, *[[Share Language (Spell)|share language]]*, *[[Slipstream (Spell)|slipstream]]*

1st—*[[Alter Winds (Spell)|alter winds]]*, *[[Ant Haul (Spell)|ant haul]]*, *[[Endure Elements (Spell)|endure elements]]*, *[[Feather Fall (Spell)|feather fall]]*, *[[Flare Burst (Spell)|flare burst]]*, *[[Identify (Spell)|identify]]*, *[[Stone Fist (Spell)|stone fist]]*, *[[Touch of the Sea (Spell)|touch of the sea]]*, *[[True Strike (Spell)|true strike]]*, *[[Vanish (Spell)|vanish]]*

**Preparation Ritual**

**Defensive Boon (Su)** You throw up a quick burst of arcane energy that deflects an incoming spell attack. As an immediate action when targeted with a touch spell or spell-like ability, you can spend this boon’s effect to gain a +4 deflection bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

**Source:** Ultimate Magic, pg. 125
